page.title: 17St.Peter's Church,Sharnbrook
page.content: The church building was begun in about 1150; it was rebuilt and had a tower added in the 1250's and remains almost unchanged today. {The pastoral care, or 'cure' is the {responsibility of the Bishop of St. {Albans,}who shares this care with the Rector. The Rector also has the care of the church building; this he shares with{two churchwardens and the {Parochial Church Council.} The Rector leads worship, baptises people, marries them and buries the dead. There are{joint services}with the {Methodist Church,}and the{Roman {Catholics}use the church for their worship. A liaison committee of clergy and laity from each church meets to plan joint services and events. Members of the churches meet for Bible study and discussion.
